channel.title: Npc walk in an area
channel.description:
Well i remember i while back you could make an npc walk around in an area, i forgot to do it, heres what ive done Coord1=spawn location Coord2=top right corner Coord3=Bottom left corner
Coord1x Coord1y 0 Coord2x Coord2y Coord3x Coord3y 1
Please note that this is not the full Autospawn code, and that i did use tabs as spaces. And tell me if i did it right so i can retry
